myProjects.name: Student Assestment App
myProjects.desc: Student Review apps build on react native and expo , the main focus of the app is reviewing presentation student do in the front of class. Save assessment, Export to PDF, assestment score

myProjects.name: HRIS
myProjects.desc: Simple Human Resource Management system build on fullstack NextJS. Most of the features is core of the HRIS. Attendance, Salary, Leave management

myProjects.name: Flask Inventory Rest-API
myProjects.desc: Inventory rest api build on Flask + MySQL. Using average as method for recounting balance and stock. Also add manage user for accessing the apps.

myProjects.name: Plant monitoring Dashboard + Backend System
myProjects.desc: Project for completing my study at my University. In this project, the Backend will log all the transaction , message, command from MQTT. Add a dashboard and report
